details.human_availability: 7 Days a Week, 9 AM - 8 PM (Local Time)
details.escalation_protocol: AI will securely transfer non-standard queries to a human agent during available hours.

policies.agent_response_template: Our AI support is available 24/7. Human assistance is available daily from 9 AM to 8 PM.

details.tone_standard: Professional, respectful, and focused on resolution.
details.prohibited_behavior: Abusive or threatening language towards agents (AI or human) will result in immediate session termination and potential account suspension.
details.identification: All virtual assistants will clearly state their AI status at the start of the interaction.

policies.agent_response_template: I am an AI assistant and am here to help. Please maintain a respectful tone as per our Communication Standard.

details.requirement_for_claim: Customer must provide verifiable evidence (e.g., error code, timestamp, screenshot) of system failure that prevented service use.
details.remedy: Full refund, service credit, or manual issuance of a valid ticket, determined case-by-case.

policies.agent_response_template: If you experienced a technical failure, please provide the error code and a screenshot so we can verify the issue and process a suitable resolution.
